response.job_title: Senior Backend Engineer at Hourly  | Software Engineer | Java Developer | Python Developer | Cloud Engineer
response.summary: Innovative and versatile Software Engineer with 4 years of hands-on experience in design, development, and deployment of software products. Oriented towards back-end and cloud-based applications using DevOps best practices. Offering the ability to analyze code and engineer well-researched, cost-effective, reliable, scalable, and responsive solutions that expedite the effectiveness of organizational success. Passionate for learning new technologies and able to take on different roles in a team to achieve specific goals. Main experience as Back End Developer and Cloud Engineer using Java, Spring framework, Python, AWS, and Serverless Framework.
response.skills: Java, Spring Framework, SQL, Unit Testing, SCRUM, Algorithms, Data Structures, Test Driven Development, Computer Science, Integration Testing, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Spring, Python, Matlab, MongoDB, Scala, NoSQL, MySQL, Oracle Database, PostgreSQL

profile_positions.description:
• Currently employed at the startup company Hourly, based in the USA. We provide digital products as time tracking, payroll calculation and payment, and policy insurance management and sales for other companies in the country. 
• Develop the Python codebase backend application that consists of several features, improvements, and refactors for the project. Leaded some of the main third-party API integrations, such as, Quickbooks and Gusto. 
• Participated in various architectural design planning for different projects.
profile_positions.title: Senior Backend Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Worked for the client Morningstar, a global financial services firm. It provides an array of investment research and investment management services. 
•	Developed backend improvements and solved issues for the international websites. The team was composed of people located in Colombia, Canada and China, which worked for almost 30 countries each one with its own website. 
•	Created documentation, solved issues and added new functionalities to the application which is written in Java and .Net. 
•	Upgraded with the newest technologies and improved the performance and stability of the Content Management System which is used by the content editors to publish articles, videos, pages, advertising and send newsletters emails. Designed and developed a reliable microservice architecture and pipeline of CD/CI.
profile_positions.title: Back End Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed a B2B e-commerce store using SAP Hybris Commerce Platform.
•	Established the integration of the e-commerce with a payment gateway through consuming and exposing RESTful web services.  
•	Performed application deployment and code integration.
•	Managed the servers and code deployment for all the environments. 
•	Developed the integration and end to end tests.
profile_positions.title: Back End Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Development of the Communication between the sensor system and the local server via Modbus TCP / IP.
• Establishing of a connection via a TCP port using websockets and client-server communication.
• Generation of the best possible communication using asynchronous programming in Python for sending data from the local server to the Azure cloud and IoT Hub. HTTPS, MQTT and AMQP protocol performance were evaluated.
profile_positions.title: Senior Research Technician Intern

profile_positions.description:
• Trained on various main skills that are needed in a software project within a web development company. Among these trainings, software development concepts and skills were reinforced. 

• As a part of the “Buzz Points” project, contributed in the development of a RESTful API and its respective tests which was used as the API Gateway that manages the microservices implemented in the project. The API was developed in both Java and Kotlin, using concepts of functional and reactive programming. The models and controllers were auto generated using Swagger Codegen. Unit, integration and mutation tests were developed, using property-based tests. Construction, testing and deployment were done through a Jenkinsfile.
profile_positions.title: Backend Developer Intern

profile_positions.description:
• Development of a metadata image editing software, used to store images in a non-relational
database (NoSQL, MongoDB).
profile_positions.title: Undergraduate Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: • Professor’s assistant in the development of materials and exercises for the courses "Principles of Dynamics" and "Mechanics of Materials" as well as conducting tutorials for students.
profile_positions.title: Teaching Assistant

company.name: Hourly
company.description: Everything you need to pay your people, your payroll taxes and your workers' comp insurance made easy as pie.
